Windows config templates

Based on $GIT_HASH

Pick the options you want or start from a preset, then click generate to get the configuration scripts. You'll get a REG file with the registry changes and a bat file with commands to launch.

$PAGE_CONTENT

If your user does not have administrator privileges you will first need to register run the process in three different steps: first register the user reg without admin, then the machine wide reg file and finally the other commands as admin
